name: NSPersistentContainer
desc: A container that encapsulates the Core Data stack in your app.

items.name: init(name: String)
items.desc: Creates a container with the specified name.

items.name: init(name: String, managedObjectModel: NSManagedObjectModel)
items.desc: Create a container with the specified name and managed object model.

items.name: class var defaultDirectoryURL: URL
items.desc: The location of the directory that contains the persistent stores.

items.name: class func defaultDirectoryURL() -> URL
items.desc: Returns the location of the directory that contains the persistent stores.

items.name: var persistentStoreDescriptions: [NSPersistentStoreDescription]
items.desc: The descriptions of the container’s persistent stores.

items.name: func newBackgroundContext() -> NSManagedObjectContext
items.desc: Returns a new managed object context that executes on a private queue.

items.name: var viewContext: NSManagedObjectContext
items.desc: The main queue’s managed object context.

items.name: func performBackgroundTask((NSManagedObjectContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Executes a closure on a private queue using an ephemeral managed object context.
